mapper.select: select comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,to_char(comm_writen_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as comm_writen_date,comm_category,comm_view_count from ( select rownum as rn, comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,comm_writen_date,comm_category,comm_view_count from community order by comm_seq desc ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select count * from ( select rownum as rn, comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,to_char(comm_writen_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as comm_writen_date ,comm_category,comm_view_count from community where ${field} like '%${query}%' order by comm_writen_date desc )

select comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,comm_writen_date ,comm_category,comm_view_count from ( select rownum as rn, comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,to_char(comm_writen_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as comm_writen_date ,comm_category,comm_view_count from community where ${field} like '%${query}%' order by comm_writen_date desc )
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(comm_seq)+1 FROM community
insert into community(comm_seq,user_id,comm_title,comm_content,comm_writen_date,comm_category,comm_view_count) values(#{comm_seq},#{user_id},#{comm_title},#{comm_content},sysdate,#{comm_category},0)
